QuestData.Title: Pork Chop
QuestData.Description:
Roland Hacksaw was the best butcher I've ever worked with... but he's gone insane! He's still processing pigs into sausage!
You have to stop him!
QuestData.RewardText: Poor Roland. He was... very good at his work. One of the finest butchers in Drustvar. It is a true shame his talents were put to such horrible use.
